name: Full Color Coyote
description:
As the full color coyote, your job is to guide the rainbow refugees across the monochromatic borders. With your magical scarf, you can disguise yourself as a resident of any of the xenophobic monochromatic borderlands.

Scout out safe passages and avoid guards and traps, or you'll end up in jail, and your refugees will be captured.

Controls:

ActionControlWalkWASD/Arrow KeysWear Rainbow ScarfSpacebar
The refugees will follow you when you wear the rainbow scarf.Wear Other Scarves1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0 on the top of the keyboard
Use the other scarves to disguise yourself. Refugees will not follow you.QuitEscape
(sorry, I didn't get a chance to put in an escape menu)

Made in 2 days  for PLAY20 Online Game Jam. Theme: "Exploring borders"

Instructions are in the game. There's also a minimap on the right side of the screen.

Tools: Unity, Tiltbrush VR, Blender

Third-party Assets: Props Animations; Tiltbrush Toolkit for Unity; Music: The Omen by Frank Schröter. Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/6915-the-omen. License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
